articles.title: Europe's JUICE mission has to squeeze into a 1-second launch window. Here's why. - Space.com
articles.description: JUICE needs the universe to align so that it can get to Jupiter with as little fuel as possible.

articles.title: France favours 'status quo' on Taiwan, position unchanged, says prez Macron - Hindustan Times
articles.description: "French and European position on Taiwan is the same one. We're in favour of the status quo. This policy is constant and hasn't changed," President Macron said. | World News
